duties_responsibilities.duty: Month-end close including (but not limited to) of inventory accounts, ensuring reconciliation of perpetual to GL.
Maintaining standard costs for inventory parts (material, labor, burden, OH and rolling of routers and product structures) including quarterly/annual updates.
Completing WO review/accounting close, analyzing variances, understanding inventory activities.
Analyzing and recording amortization of capitalized PPV/manufacturing variances.
Participating in the annual physical inventory for finance, including reconciling the results to the general ledger and perpetual, coordinating tasks and personnel.
Completing miscellaneous account analyses as requested.
Documenting procedures and streamlining transaction processing to improve efficiencies.
Completion of monthly balance sheet reconciliations as assigned.
Supporting annual external audit and tax analysis as assigned.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting or Finance; minimum 5 years’ Accounting experience.
